title: Lesson 4 â€” Exposures connect models to real usage
description: Exposures do not transform data. They simply map models to the dashboards or notebooks that use them.
concept: This connects data to usage so you know why the model exists.
hint: Add a comment like `-- exposure: Sales Dashboard` near the SELECT.

reveal_sections.title: What changed
reveal_sections.body: The model now signals which downstream artifact relies on it.

reveal_sections.title: Why this matters
reveal_sections.body: Exposures help you trace impact when the data changes.

takeaway: Exposures explain who cares about the data.

tasks.prompt: Declare an exposure (e.g., `-- exposure: Sales Dashboard`).

check.hint: Add a comment naming the downstream usage.
